item.title: Video: Flying Superheroes of the Hitchcock Cinematic Universe (spoilers)
item.description: Just expanding on a little silly idea I had. What if I reversed a bunch of falling people from Hitchcock films and turned them into awkwardly flying superheroes? Definitely works better in some than others. Judge for yourself! Possible spoiler alert for these movies: To Catch A Thief (1955) Vertigo (1958) Jamaica Inn (1939) The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934) Foreign Correspondent (1940) The Man Who Knew Too Much (1956) Rear Window (1954) Saboteur (1942) North by Northwest (1959)
